tool.name: VAF Background Checker
tool.description: Check whether a VAF can be distinguished from background noise.

param.name: vcf
param.label: Input
param.help: Input VCF to include IN_BKGD tag for variants that meet criteria.

param.name: bkgd
param.label: Background Estimate
param.help: Expected contribution to VAF estimates by background.

param.name: pval
param.label: P-Value
param.help: P-value to utilize as cutoff in binomial test.

tool.help:
usage: bkgd_estimate.py [-h] [--vcf VCF] [--outfile OUTFILE] [--bkgd BKGD] [--pval PVAL]
optional arguments: -h, --help show this help message and exit --vcf VCF Input VCF to apply background estimate VCF FILTERs to. --outfile OUTFILE Output VCF. --bkgd BKGD Estimate of assay background VAF. --pval PVAL P-value at which VAF will be deemed indeterminate.
